chapters.title: Chapter 36: Unchangeable Things
chapters.info: Urien, p. 608—Red-haired Aiel of the Two Spires sept of the Reyn Aiel. He is Aethan Dor, a Red Shield. He wears his bright red hair short except for a tail at the back. He bet a skin of oosquai on their triumph in Tarmon Gai'don. Mat asks him, too late, who would make such a ludicrous bet against him.
